title: About
text:
I’m Renato Ventocilla, a data scientist and visualization expert with a passion for using data to tell compelling stories.
This page provides more details about my background, research interests, and projects.

title: Renato Ventocilla
text:
Hello! I’m Renato Ventocilla, a social data scientist and data visualization designer. This website is where I share my work, insights, and projects in data analysis, visualization, and storytelling.



📊 Data Projects – A collection of data-driven insights, dashboards, and analyses.
✍️ Blog Posts – My thoughts on data science, public policy, and research.
📄 Resume & Experience – A snapshot of my professional background.




Feel free to explore my work and reach out if you’re interested in collaboration!
